content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(x=9.5, y=11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) connecting input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 at position(9.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) connecting assembling machine to output chest
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 800 electronic circuits

### Smelting Area near origin
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces have 9 coal each as fuel but are currently idle with no ingredients

### Power Generation System at position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected to electrical network with multiple poles

### Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab with automation and logistic science packs loaded
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

### Electrical Network (ID: 66823)
Multiple electric poles connecting power generation to various machines and labs across the map

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Prerequisites
- Check technology prerequisites before attempting research:
  - Solar Energy requires Optics research first
  - Logistics-3 requires Production Science Pack
  - Automation-3 requires Speed Module
  - Chemical Science Pack requires Advanced Electronics
  - Advanced Electronics requires Plastics
  - Plastics requires Oil Processing

### Already Researched Technologies
- Verify if technology is already researched before attempting research again. Following were already completed:
  - Electronics
  - Military Science
  - Logistics-2
  - Automation-2
  - Logistics Science Pack
  - Advanced Material Processing

### Resource Management
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert into boiler
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to maintain power generation

### Entity Connections
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure proper alignment and valid connection points between boiler and steam engine
